explanation: The stage direction 'L'ange touche la terre avec sa palme, et fait jaillir à l'instant une source abondante.' describes a general character action of the angel touching the ground with his palm and causing a spring to gush forth. This fits best under the 'action' category as it describes a specific action performed by the character that does not fall into any of the other more specific categories.
stgdir: L'ange touche la terre avec sa palme, et fait jaillir à l'instant une source abondante.
